actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide an equal opportunity to all feed grain producers who desire to participate in the 1973 feed grains program.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide an opportunity to all feed grain producers who desire to participate in the 1973 feed grains program and to make available any option which was not available during the signup period ending March 16, 1973. (Amends 7 U.S.C. 1441nt.)

titles.title: A bill to provide an equal opportunity to all feed grain producers who desire to participate in the 1973 feed grains program.
